title: Chunky banana nut chip ice cream
ingredients: ['4 bananas, broken into chunks', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '300ml (1/2 pint) double cream, chilled', '175ml (6 fl oz) milk, chilled', '75g (3 oz) chopped toasted walnuts', '100g (4 oz) miniature chocolate chips']
